bisq.core.btc.wallet

Class BisqDefaultCoinSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • bisq.core.btc.wallet.BisqDefaultCoinSelector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bitcoinj.wallet.CoinSelector
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BsqCoinSelector

    public abstract class BisqDefaultCoinSelector
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bitcoinj.wallet.CoinSelector
    Used from org.bitcoinj.wallet.DefaultCoinSelector but added selectOutput method and changed static methods to instance methods.

    This class implements a CoinSelector which attempts to get the highest priority possible. This means that the transaction is the most likely to get confirmed. Note that this means we may end up "spending" more priority than would be required to get the transaction we are creating confirmed.
